original_title: Axel Rudi Pell: One Night Live
overview: One Night Live: Live At The Rock Of Ages Festival 2009 is a 1 disc live DVD by German guitarist Axel Rudi Pell, released in 2010 by SPV GmbH.  The DVD contains the full performance of the Rock Of Ages Festival 2009 in Germany.  1."Tear Down The Walls"  2."Strong As A Rock"  3."Medley: The Masquerade Ball/Casbah/Tales of the Crown"  4."Drum Solo"  5."Rock The Nation"  6."The Temple of the King"  7."Mystica"  8."Fool Fool/Eternal Prisoner"  The live performance is also featured on the second disc of the 'deluxe edition' of The Crest.  [edit] PersonnelJohnny Gioeli – Vocals  Axel Rudi Pell – Guitar  Volker Krawczak – Bass  Mike Terrana – Drums  Ferdy Doernberg – Keyboards
title: Axel Rudi Pell: One Night Live
